entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tracadie-Sheila
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 12:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
